EMP_NUM: The unique identifier for each employee. DataType: int
EMP_LNAME: The last name of the employee. DataType: varchar
EMP_FNAME: The first name of the employee. DataType: varchar
EMP_INITIAL: The middle initial of the employee. DataType: varchar
EMP_JOBCODE: The job code of the employee. DataType: varchar
EMP_HIREDATE: The date when the employee was hired. DataType: date
EMP_DOB: The date of birth of the employee. DataType: date
table_explanation: This table contains information about employees. It includes their unique identifier, last name, first name, middle initial, job code, hire date, and date of birth.
